Description: This sample (TARA_N000000202) was collected during the Tara Oceans expedition (2009-2013) at station TARA_051 (latitudeN=-21.5043, longitudeE=54.3563) on date/time=2010-05-11T03:42, using a PUMP (High Volume Peristaltic Pump).
